title: Aishen Qiaokeli-ing...
alternative_title: Cupid's Chocolates, Aishen Qiaokeli Jinxingshi, 爱神巧克力ING...
description: Jiang Hao Yi, a normal, high school student who is extremely scared of getting into trouble suddenly becomes the Harem King of his school and gets confessed to by a bunch of beautiful girls! The worst thing is, Jiang hao doesn't know any of the girls who confessed to him! What on earth is happening?
